bibliography.title: Kinetic investigation of the time-resolved atomic fluorescence Ca(4^3P_1 → 4^1S_o) and molecular chemiluminescence CaBr(A^2π, B^2Σ^+ → X^2Σ^+) following the pulse-dye laser generation of Ca(4^3P_J) in the presence of CH_3Br
